ISSUE.TITLE: AngularJS Client
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I wrote a module with plugin for AngularJS apps to use the API via ngResource. It seems to be working very well. It would be great to have some feedback, testing, etc from other AngularJS + WordPress users. https://github.com/jeffsebring/angular-wp-api

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add better taxonomy support Fixes #275 for now. git-svn-id: http://gsoc.svn.wordpress.org/2013/rmccue/trunk@2351 f69abe3c-2ee2-4550-9a6d-17bd458115be
